section.section:
The salary of the chairman of the county board is:
$3,820 for calendar years 1999 through 2002; and
$5,000 per year beginning January 1, 2003 and for each subsequent year.
The chairman is entitled, for travel and other expenses, to $1,500 in calendar year 1999 and each subsequent year.

The salary of the vice chairman of the county board is:
$3,500 for the calendar years 1999 through 2002; and
$4,000 per year beginning January 1, 2003 and each subsequent year.
The vice chairman is entitled to $600 each year for travel and other expenses.

The salary of a member of the county board is:
$3,185 for the calendar years 1998 through 2002; and
$4,000 per year beginning January 1, 2003 and each subsequent year.
Each member is entitled to $600 each year for travel and other expenses.

text.section: Each salary provided under this section shall be paid on a quarterly basis.
